MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KY8 postcode area of Buckhaven, We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 9:09am. Our engineers have arrived on site and Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 12:15pm. We will update this message if this information changes.  We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:08 AM on Monday, 02 November 2020..
